ticket.title: CLI credential management commands: migrate to ProtocolServer IPC

tickets.reason: ProtocolServer dispatchers must handle credential management requests.
Protocol clients (OperatorClient) provide the IPC transport.

in_scope: Migrate `apm2 creds list` to use OperatorClient with new ListCredentials message type.
Migrate `apm2 creds add` to use OperatorClient with new AddCredential message type.
Migrate `apm2 creds remove` to use OperatorClient with new RemoveCredential message type.
Migrate `apm2 creds refresh` to use OperatorClient with new RefreshCredential message type.
Migrate `apm2 creds switch` to use OperatorClient with new SwitchCredential message type.
Migrate `apm2 creds login` to use OperatorClient with new LoginCredential message type.
Add daemon-side handlers in ProtocolServer for all credential message types.

steps: Define protobuf message types for credential management.
Add message type tags to PrivilegedMessageType enum.
Implement daemon-side handlers wiring to existing credential storage.
Update OperatorClient with credential request methods.
Replace stubs in creds.rs with OperatorClient calls.

criteria: All 6 creds commands work via OperatorClient (no JSON IPC).

notes.security:
Credential operations are privileged and MUST use operator.sock (mode 0600).
Credential secrets must never be logged or exposed in error messages.
notes.files:
- crates/apm2-cli/src/commands/creds.rs (stubs to replace)
- crates/apm2-cli/src/client/protocol.rs (add methods)
- crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/messages.rs (add types)
- crates/apm2-daemon/src/protocol/dispatch.rs (add handlers)
